ygData.subject: Re: Pots?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This is second hand, but one of the posts, said the image of the molds was visibly altered, and that the three people who posted that they found them were
ygData.messageBody:
>>Someone might have already sent this in, but the eqvault board that
>>had the messages about the weapon/weapon-mold sketches, now has
>> >messagesindicating it was a hoax, including an apparent confession to
>> >the hoax.
>
>Don't know what to believe at this point. Personally, they could very well
>exist. After all, if they did and everyone suddenly took an interest in
>finding them, I'd admit it was a hoax to, to eliminate any competition.
>Personally, I'll have a look for myself to verify the case either way.

This is second hand, but one of the posts, said the image of the molds was
visibly altered, and that the three people who posted that they found them
were all from the same small rural isp. I haven't verified it, and I
probably won't I'm not in a big hurry to make weapons.
